column4: hey guys, im trying to install Ubuntu Studio and im using partition magic to divide my D:\ drive in two, one for my linux area. And PM is saying to me that its better chose EXT2 than EXT3 file system. what shoud i choose?
ext3 is bettter, but don't use partition tragic... use gparted :)  it's on the ubuntu livecd
you wont' "kill" windows... you just resize it
